Package main

Class ParameterReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.ParameterReader
  • public class ParameterReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to read the parameters from the command line or from a file.

    The parameters include:

    • readingMode: The reading mode (0 for -r, 1 for -f).
    • n: The number of nodes in the graph.
    • a: The nest node.
    • n1: The weight of traversing an edge.
    • alpha: The parameter concerning the ant movements.
    • beta: The parameter concerning the ant movements.
    • delta: The parameter concerning the ant movements.
    • eta: The parameter concerning the pheromone evaporation.
    • rho: The parameter concerning the pheromone evaporation.
    • gamma: The parameter concerning the pheromone evaporation.
    • nu: The ant colony size.
    • tau: The final instant of the simulation.
